mapper.select: SELECT r.user_no ,r.reser_no ,r.usage_status ,c.name as commonName ,c.common_no ,TO_CHAR(c.reser_start_time, 'HH24:MI') AS reser_start_time ,TO_CHAR(c.reser_end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS reser_end_time ,r.reser_date ,c.common_kind ,c.image ,c.content FROM common_Item c LEFT JOIN reser r ON r.common_no = c.common_no LEFT JOIN employee e ON r.user_no = e.user_no

SELECT r.user_no ,r.reser_no ,r.usage_status ,c.name as commonName ,c.common_no ,TO_CHAR(c.reser_start_time, 'HH24:MI') AS reser_start_time ,TO_CHAR(c.reser_end_time, 'HH24:MI') AS reser_end_time ,c.date_select ,c.common_kind ,c.image ,c.content FROM common_Item c LEFT JOIN reser r ON r.common_no = c.common_no LEFT JOIN employee e ON r.user_no = e.user_no WHERE c.common_no = #{commonNo} AND ROWNUM = 1
